group.title: Email Templates
group.template:
Hello $username,
You have just registered at $bboptions[details_boardname]. There is only one step left to complete your registration process. In order to complete it, you must click the following link to activate your account.
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/register.php?do=activate&hash=$useridHash
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
In regards to the COPPA compliance, it is required that a parent give consent to his/her child in order to join $bboptions[details_boardname]. The only form of information that can be used to contact your child, was his/her email address, and can only be seen by the administrators of $bboptions[details_boardname], and your child can have the option to disable receiving emails from anyone. Other than that, no other contact details were collected. If you do not want your child participating on the message board, you do not need to do anything. All information collected will be deleted within seven days after your child filled in the requested information, if you do not activate the account.
All you need to do is click the following link below, in order to activate your childs account, so he/she can post messages.
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/register.php?do=activate&hash=$useridHash
If you would like the review the site first, you may find the following link helpful:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]
If you cannot click on any of the above links, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You have just changed your email address via the User Control Panel. In order to finish the change in your email address, the administrator has required that all users verify their email address. If you did not want to change your email address, simply do nothing. As you will only be able to validate your email within 24 hours of the request.
In order to finish the validation process, click the following link:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/usercp.php?do=email&action=validate
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $user[username],
$userinfo[username] has just posted an entry in your profile guestbook entitled "$threadTitle".
If you would like to view your guestbook entries, click the following link. If you cannot click the link, you will need to copy and paste it into the address bar of your browser.
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/guestbook.php?u=$user[userid]
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello Administrator,
You have requested that an email notification be sent to you whenever there is a new registration. Here are the details:
Username: $username Email: $email
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You are receiving this email because it has become apparent that you Personal Messaging quota of $quota messages. In order to receive any more Personal Messages you must make room. You can visit your Personal Messaging area by following the link below:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/personal.php
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You have requested that you be sent an email notification every time you receive a Personal Message.
You have received a personal message from $fromUsername entitled "$pmTitle". To view your new personal message, click the following link:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/personal.php?pid=$insertPMID
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello Administrator/Moderator,
$userinfo[username] has reported a post entitled "$postinfo[title]". All administrators, super moderators, and moderators of this forum have been emailed.
The reason $userinfo[username] gave was:
$theReason
If you would like to view the post, click the following link. If you cannot click the link, you will need to copy and paste it into the address bar of your browser.
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/thread.php?p=$postinfo[postid]
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You are being sent this email because you have requested to reset your password. If you did not request to reset your password, simply do nothing, as this oppurtunity to reset your password will become invoid in 24 hours.
If you wish to reset your password, go to the link below:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/other.php?do=password&hash=$useridHash
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You have requested an e-mail notification when a new reply was made in the thread $thread_title.
To view the thread, click the following link:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/thread.php?t=$threadinfo[threadid]&do=newestpost
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
You have requested an e-mail notification when a new thread was made in the forum $forum_title.
To view the thread, click the following link:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/thread.php?t=$insertThreadID&do=newestpost
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into your address bar, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $user[username],
$userinfo[username] has warned you for $typeinfo[name] in the post entitled "$post[title]".
If you would like to view the post, click the following link. If you cannot click the link, you will need to copy and paste it into the address bar of your browser.
$bboptions[details_boardurl]/thread.php?p=$post[postid]
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

Hello $username,
Welcome to $bboptions[details_boardname]!
You are receiving this email, because you have just recently registered or activated your account.
If you forgot the link, here it is:
$bboptions[details_boardurl]
If you cannot click the above link, copy and paste it into the address bar of your browser, and click "Go".
Regards, $bboptions[details_boardname] Staff $bboptions[details_boardurl]

group.title: Errors and Thank Yous
group.template:
Enter forum Password

Password:

Permissions Error

You do not have access to view this page. It could be due to many things:

1. You are not logged in. You can log in by filling out the form below.

2. You do not have the privileges to access this page. You could be trying to perform an administrative action, or trying to edit someone else's post.

3. The administrator could have disabled your account, or your account may be awaiting activation.

group.title: Register
group.template:
You have chosen to disagree with the forum rules. In order to proceed with registration, you must agree to the forum rules. Knowing that, what would you like to do?

Return to the forum index --- Restart Registration

Date Of Birth
Enter your Date of Birth:

Month

Day

Year

$coppaParent
Required Registration Information
Username:
Password:
Confirm Password:
E-mail Address:

You must enter a valid email, as your account may need to be validated via email.
Forum Customization
Referrer:

If a user existing at this forum referred you here, enter that user's username here.
Default Time Zone Offset
Enable Daylight Savings Time?
Allow users to email you?
Receive Personal Messages?

Parent's E-mail Address:

You must enter a valid email, as your parent must give you consent by way of email.

$coppaDesc

Forum Rules:

Registering at this forum is completely free, and you do so under your own free will. In order to proceed with the registration you must agree that you have acknowledged these forum rules.

The forum Administrators and Moderators try to keep this forum clean, however they cannot catch everything. The adminstrators, owners, developers of wtcBB, and moderators are not responsible for the content of any message posted here, as the author of that message is solely responsible for it. Therefore, only the author of a message can be held accountable for the content of that message. Owners, developers of wtcBB, administrators, or moderators have the right to remove, edit, add, or alter anyone's account or messages for any reason they deem necessary.

By clicking the "I Agree" link below, you agree to follow the rules stated here, and any rules, regulations, or guidelines stated by the administrators, owners, or moderators of this forum.

I Agree --- I Disagree

COPPA Compliancy:

The owners of this message board are allowing COPPA registrations. Since you have stated that you are under the age of 13, you must comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act. In order to do so, you must receive parental consent via email. Until then, you will not be able to post messages of any kind on this message board. If you do not receive parental consent via email within seven days of completing the registration form, all information provided will be deleted.

This section allows you to edit your default BB Code. Default BB Code will automatically be placed inside your post so you don't have to type it in every time.

Edit Default BB Code
Default Font:
Default Color:
Default Size:
Use Automatically:

The option to use it when posting and sending personal messages will simply automatically be checked. You can uncheck it to not use the default BB Code. If this is set to off, you can also always check it to use it occasionally.

$activationNotice
Edit Email
Current Email Address: $userinfo[email]

After you enter your username here, you will be sent an email with a link to reset your password. If you do not click the link within 24 hours of filling out this form, you will need to fill out this form again.

Password Reset
Username:

$beInvisible $pickStyle
Edit Preferences
Default thread view age
Default posts per page:
Default Time Zone Offset
Enable Daylight Savings Time?
Enable Guestbook?
Receive Administrator Emails:

Administrators may email you via the control panel. These emails may contain important announcement that everyone may need to know about.
Allow others to email you?

Note: They will not be able to view your email address. They will only be able to email you via a form on the message board.
Receive Personal Messages?

This will allow other uses to send you a personal message by way of the message board. This will not stop you from sending personal messages.
Receive Personal Message E-mail notification?

The message board will send you an email notifying you of a new Personal Message.
Receive Popup Personal Message Notification?

This will show you a small popup alert whenever you have received a new personal message while you are on the message board.
Display other users' signatures?

If you disable this, you will not be able to view any other user's signature.
Display other users' avatars?

If you disable this, you will not be able to view any other user's avatar.
Display attachments?

If you disable this, you will not be able to view other users' attachments.
Enable posting toolbar?

The posting toolbar gives you a variety of different bb Codes to use easily. Disabling the toolbar, does not disable the use of bb Code. You might want to disable this, if your browser does not support javascript, or you have turned off javascript.
Automatic thread subscription?

Enabling this will simply check the option to subscribe to a thread when posting one, or replying to one.
Post display order:

You can reverse the order in which posts are displayed.

Be Invisible?

When you are invisible, you will not be able to be seen in the who's online, users browsing threads, or users browsing forum by users who don't have permission to view invisible users.

Style

You can select from a list of styles specified by the administrator. Each may give a different look and feel to the forum.
